rune.author: billythegoat101: Demonstrations pack
rune.sacrifices: Sacrifice: -4xSnowBlock + 1xGhastTear + 20XP Notes: -Will last for a three days unless fueled.
rune.description: Description: Summons a sprite which follows the player and freezes the surface of liquids. Water turns to ice and lava turns to obsidian. Demonstrates: Item sacrifices, XP Sacrifices, Powered runes, Pausing, and Following sprites.
